verbose_text: The RhoGTPase activating domain in Myo9b inhibits Rho, reducing the downstream activity of ROCK (RhoKinase), thereby increasing MLC phosphatase activity, reducing MLC phosphorylation, and, therefore, reducing actin stress fiber formation.
evidence: Rho, reducing the downstream activity of ROCK (RhoKinase), thereby increasing MLC phosphatase activity, reducing MLC phosphorylation
